means: 注定(destine的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
sentence.Network_cn: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。

sentence.Network_en: Everyone knew that Muriel was destined for great things.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有人都知道缪里尔命中注定要成就一番伟业。

sentence.Network_en: London seems destined to lose more than 2,000 hospital beds.
sentence.Network_cn: 伦敦似乎一定会丧失2,000多个医院床位。

死神来了ⅠⅡⅢ Ⅳ合集死神来了（Final Destination）是2000年上映的惊悚电影。故事讲述高中生艾利克斯（Alex)预见到人们的死亡…
(八)最终目的地(Final Destination)指联合运输终点站。本栏目应是当次运输的运费截止地。

entry.def: If something is destined to happen or if someone is destined to behave in a particular way, that thing seems certain to happen or be done.

example.ex: He feels that he was destined to become a musician...
example.tran: 他觉得自己注定会成为一名音乐家。

example.ex: London seems destined to lose more than 2,000 hospital beds...
example.tran: 伦敦似乎一定会丧失2,000多个医院床位。

entry.def: If someone is destined for a particular place, or if goods are destined for a particular place, they are travelling towards that place or will be sent to that place.

example.tran: 运往沙特阿拉伯的产品

means.word_mean: 1. headed or intending to head in a certain direction; often used as a combining form as in `college-bound students';

sentences.sentence: "an old house destined to be demolished"

auth_sentence.content: One riddim destined for the top, for sure!
auth_sentence.res_content: One riddim destined for the top, for sure!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One riddim destined for the top, for sure!

auth_sentence.content: Reggae was destined to become cool within a decade.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reggae was destined to become cool within a decade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reggae was destined to become cool within a decade.

auth_sentence.content: We are not locked or destined by our genomes.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are not locked or destined by our genomes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are not locked or destined by our genomes.

means.word_mean: 命中注定的, 预定的

sentences.cn: 医学是他注定要从事的职业。

sentences.en: They were destined never to see each other again.
sentences.cn: 他们命中注定再也不能相见。

sentences.en: It was destined that they would marry.

means.word_mean: 开往, 运往, 前往, 以…为目的地的

sentences.en: This is a train destined for London.
sentences.cn: 这是一列开往伦敦的火车。

sentences.en: The shipment is destined for America.

jushi.chinese: 医学是他注定要从事的职业。

jushi.english: This is a train destined for London.
jushi.chinese: 这是一列开往伦敦的火车。

jushi.english: Coming from a theatrical family, he was destined for a career on the stage.
jushi.chinese: 他生于戏剧之家,注定了他的舞台生涯。
